postCreateCommand.mongo: podman pull docker.io/library/mongo:4.4-focal;  podman run -d --name architecture-mongo mongo:4.4-focal;
postCreateCommand.mail-server: podman pull docker.io/greenmail/standalone:2.1.5; podman run -d --name architecture-mail greenmail/standalone:2.1.5

postStartCommand.sql-server: podman stop architecture-sql; podman start architecture-sql
postStartCommand.mongo: podman stop architecture-mongo; podman start architecture-mongo
postStartCommand.mail-server: podman stop architecture-mail; podman start architecture-mail
